item.title: corCTF 2022 - corchat, nbd
item.description: I played corCTF last week with my team purf3ct and managed to solve 4 pwn challenges. Here are my writeups for some of them. All of my exploit scripts can be found here. corchat: Category: pwn Points: 334 Solves: 10 Description: Can you pwn our internal, terribly written, chat program? Overview The binary implements a chat server which allows a maximum of 4 Crusaders at a time. There are 4 modes:

Hi! My name is Phan Vinh Khang, also known as pivik. I am currently an Information Security student at University of Information Technology Vietnam. I have been learning pwn for the last few years. I also play ctf with my team purf3ct. Hopefully I will develop more skills in Information Security field in the upcoming years. My Github and Twitter.
